content.question: Which of the following will lead to a depreciation of a nation’s currency?

choices.label: Lower inflation in the nation than in the rest of the world
Higher required reserve ratio in the nation than in the rest of the world
Decreased real interest rates in the nation compared with the rest of the world
Increased demand for the nation’s currency
Decreased supply of the nation’s currency

content.answer: Decreased real interest rates in the nation compared with the rest of the world

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.4: Effect of Changes in Policies and Economic Conditions on the Foreign Exchange Market

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
